segments.text: I don't like it. It makes me upset.
Well, you're only a few steps away. Do not worry.
I don't want to be a few steps away. I want to be by your side, okay?
Okay, from here on out, I will promise you I will remain by your side.
You are a mighty phoenix, what are you doing?
You need to toughen up, and not grovel so much to the queen.
That I must have my honor and those-
I have been learning from my guild master, who is a great knight.
Yes, would you please be my mother?
Yes, it would make me very happy.
It is a knight's duty to bring people happiness.
Yes, I am actually loyal to making money.
I see, I do it out for money, I see, I see.
And what do I owe you for it?
nothing nope yeah you keep on giving me so much bread are you sure we are part of the
same guild we should look out for each other right a good night shows generosity
I came here to help you yes I will I told you I would I told you I would remain by your side
a good night shows dedication protects others for just my train of thought for honor
hello romeo uh it's uh elizabeth hello elizabeth you were brought here to serve
the king give me answers about mocha core she will hate you forever
yes say the word those words out of your mouth with i i i will hate you
My king shall be the only one who likes my power.
It is but the calm before the storm, and something yet more terrible is brewing as we speak.
As such, I ask that you take this time to prepare, train your combat skills, and stock up on any items you might need.
This may be your last chance, so make the most of it.
It's all in my head, it's all in my head, it makes me upset.
You're only a few steps away, do not worry.
I don't want to be a few steps away, I want to be by your side, okay?
Okay, from here on out, I will promise you, I will remain by your side.
You are a mighty phoenix, what are you doing?
You need to toughen up and not grovel so much to the queen.
Thought I must have my honor in those.
I have been learning from my guild master, who is a great knight.
Yes, would you please be my mother?
Yes, it would make me very happy.
It is a knight's duty to bring people happiness.
Yes, I am actually loyal to making money.
I see, I do it out for money, I see, I see.
And what do I owe you for it, mother?
Y'all, you keep on giving me so much bread, are you sure?
We are part of the same guild, we should look out for each other, right?
I came here to help you.
Yes, I told you I would remain by your side.
A good knight shows dedication, protects others for just...
For honor, for the Jade Sword, Revelation.
You were brought here to serve the king.
Give me answers about Mokokoro. She will hate you forever.
Yeah, say those words out of your mouth, witch.
Uh, I, I, I will hate you.
My king shall be the only one who likes my power.
I fear tis but the calm before the storm and something yet more terrible is brewing as we speak.
As such, I ask that you take this time to prepare, train your combat skills, and stock up on any items you might need.
This may be your last chance, so make the most of it.
I don't like it. It makes me upset.
Well, you're only a few steps away.
I don't want to be a few steps away. I want to be by your side, okay?
Okay. From here on out, I will promise you I will remain by your side.
You need to toughen up and not revel so much to the queen.
I must have my honor and those.
I have been learning from my guild master, who is a great knight.
Yes, would you please be my mother?
Yes, it would make me very happy.
It is a knight's duty to bring people happiness.
Yes, I am actually loyal to making money.
I see, I do it out for money, I see, I see.
And what do I owe you for it, mother?
Yeah, you keep on giving me so much bread, are you sure?
We are part of the same guild, we should look out for each other.
Oh no! I came here to help you!
Yes, I will, I told you I would, I told you I would remain by your side!
A good knight shows dedication, protects others.
I've lost my train of thought.
On my phone it says I got a missed call.
Ah, I see I have a missed call from you, Gonnathon.
Yes, I wanted to speak to you privately.
Are you in a safe location?
I can meet you in the tavern on the grounds of Jade Sword.
Yes, the one that Callie owns.
I believe that will be safe enough.
Fare thee well and see you in a mo.
Ugh, she hung up on me.
This is of course a ploy for something.
I'll just let her stand there for a moment so I can show you, you know,
boss lady mode and be intimidating and such.
I am looking at you from the door. I am knocking.
You cannot see me in the door!
Sorry, I was upstairs and I was-
There's so many stairs, you see.
Thank you for meeting with me.
I didn't hear the door at first.
Yes, yes. May we speak upstairs?
Oh, yeah. I'm glad we speak somewhere private.
Yes, as long as we stand near the edge of the tavern, I think it is.
Let's go over here and stand here.
Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame, I know that we've had our differences, but I am coming to you in seek of your help, your assistance.
I know you do not like my statue of the Queen Tamgander.
I know that it disgusts you, but last night someone had defaced it.
Let me send you a sketch of it in my head.
In my statue, I will be sending it through carrier pigeon.
Wait, we need to go outside so the pigeon can come through. Wait.
Oh, yes, the pigeon. The pigeon.
Break open the window! Break open the window!
No, I cannot! It's not my place!
God, out the door! Out the door! Where's the pigeon?
Oh my, that is... that is just awful!
It is awful? It is quite awful, is it not?
I would not wish it on my worst enemy! I would never do that to you!
I... I... yeah, I hope not!
It's quite terrifying. I nearly vomited at the sight.
I vomited at the sight anyway, but you know, Keisara...
Vomit for the both of us.
When I had spoke of it, Nerissa Ravencroft, your something, I do not know your relation,
but Nerissa Ravencroft had said that she made a very valid point saying the only one that could
have defaced the statue is someone in the Cerulean Guild because we can only build on our own lands.
Yes, there is a magic upon these lands.
Yes, yes. And when I called for a trial, Princess Koseki Piju was very against it. And it seems that
She is crafting a corrupted land. I fear that the princess may be corrupt.
Well, if I may be so blunt. If I may be so blunt, Gonnathan. I feel all of the... Gonnathan. I feel all... Dear Gonnathan, I fear...
Yes, yes, yes, yes. Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame.
I fear... Lady Bloodflame. I fear...
I fear... Lady Bloodflame, what do you fear?
That everyone upon these lands who say they are of royal blood are not of that.
Your queen, the cat queen, the princess.
I feel they are secretly all in cahoots.
I believe you only partly because I believe in my queen.
Stop it! Snap out of it!
I cannot! She has shown me such kindness!
How has she shown you kindness?
She had built me a home. She has shown me a home.
She has shown me kindness and words that I've never received from another before.
And she had left me a note. She told me that she had believed in me and that I would serve as her knight.
They're the kindest words that I've ever heard!
GONATHAN, I know now how loyal you are, and how you do have a knight's heart.
And somewhere within my heart, I believe so too.
You should not grovel to such a queen that says pretty words.
It's all about actions as well, GONATHAN.
She acted so much for us.
Just for you? In front of you?
Behind your back, Gonnathan? She has been a bully to others.
She has been disgusting with her words.
She put a phoenix, a mighty phoenix...
I do not know if you received that memory of the mighty phoenix,
but she was so rude to that mighty phoenix.
She was rude to the phoenix?
She said... I met with her today. She said she was loyal to the queen.
but the queen does not see her her her power she just sees her as another servant
i see but if you even if you may your words may hold a bit of truth
i would like to believe in her until she returns if you think that is okay until i can confront her
but until then i continue to fight for her and these lands
I am begging for your help.
There is an evil in this kingdom, and I do not know how to confront it.
Regardless of where your loyalties lie,
wishes to give you my sword.
Even though we've had our differences,
I know that I can find a kindred
Right. Now let's journey to see if we can find the culprit of the defamed Worm Queen.
Who is in her tower? Oh.
Who is the good night and who is the bad night?
If she steps into the tavern, I could shut the door behind.
There's something we must do to find the treasure.
My eyes were blurry for a second. Apologies.
You know what, my dear daughter?
I would like to treat you to...
What kind of treat, may I ask?
That is but a surprise. I have saved it but for you, my dearest daughter.
I watched her create it. A delicious, yummy treat.
Well, I must know what it is, perhaps I may be aler-
But you spoiled the surprise, dear daughter!
But, uh, you know, allergies aren't important, you know.
Oh, I'm good. I already have chocolate cake if I'm alive.
I saved it just for you!
It seems that she really wants to speak to you.
Last night you were, you were quite, you were quite hesitant of being called mother and me being called your daughter.
I remember, I remember you were quite, you were quite...
I, look, my dearest daughter, I slept on it, and I remembered.
Yes, I remembered as I, as I, before I slept, I could not even sleep,
because I was thinking about a night's duty.
And part of a night's duty is to make others happy.
And I want to make you happy by calling you my daughter.
You are my mother, aren't you?
Yes, and you are Princess Bloodflame.
I will go with you to the tavern.
That is a good girl. Good daughter.
I'm going to go get you the cake.
Wait, we didn't say who was there.
Do not disturb Grave here. What is this?
Oh, it is but a jest.
Oh, I see, I see. A jest.
Yeah, it is but a jest.
Now, come hith and sit here, dearest daughter.
You know, you wouldn't lie to me, would you?
Of course not, mother! You're my mother! Blood flame!
DID YOU DO IT?! DID YOU DO IT?! DID YOU DEFAME THE STATUE OVER THERE?! DID YOU DO IT?! DID YOU?!
Hey, maybe she did not do it. Why are you attacking her all of a sudden?
I'm being a strict mother here!
You need to sit on the naughty step and think about what you have done!
You have trapped her here to yell at her?
Mama, why does she do this to me?
Did you? Did you defame that statue?
I don't know what to do!
Bonifan spent hours on that statue. Hours!
Yes, Alice! Yes! And I watched the glory of the Queen!
Yes, I did! It wasn't... it wasn't me, Mother! I was... I was...
You promise? In the name of Bloodflame, you promise?
In the name of Bloodflame, yes. It was not me, Mother. I did not...
You swear on your mother? You swear on me?
I swear on my Bloodflame mother, yes. Yes.
I see. Well... Well, dearest daughter...
WHO DID IT THEN? WHO DO YOU THINK DID IT? WHO DID IT? WHO DO YOU THINK DID IT?
And you would push her in such a way?
Mother, yes, I love you too.
Now, who do you think did it?
Well, there was, there was, there was somebody in the, what was it, in the...
In the rest of the Ravencroft saying that...
God and G might have defaced their own statue, cause...
Eh? Why would I do that?
I don't know, but I heard it from the...
Why would Nerissa Ravencroft say such a thing?
Well, that was a suggestion that she might have suggested in the group talk.
Would you take your hat off for a woman?
Okay, I will prove to you.
No, you would never deface my queen.
Did you? Did you? Maybe you were cursed by the witches, and you were, you were cursed to defa-
Yes, there are witches, dear princess, dear daughter.
Yes, there are witches. Maybe they cursed you to go and defame-
The witches? Well, one of them is Nerissa.
How am I to know if you are not the one possessed?
She used her charm on me.
He has used... What else has she done to you?
Father! Have you been corrupted by Narissa Ravencroft, brother?
I would never. I am stronger than any witch.
You hear me? Stronger. More powerful.
As much as she has stalked me, the witch has stalked me, she is stalking me...
...to see my weaknesses, you see, Carnarvon.
But, it seems like she is your weakness, Mother.
You do seem to fall to her.
I do not fall to a witch.
What are those strange noises you are making every time I mention her name?
No, I ate too much bread.
Oh, you are not trustworthy at all!
You are not trustworthy at all!
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, I am-
I will not be with an untrustworthy-
I saw some citizens in need.
I was in there with them, Jonathan.
I am not hexed by the witch. I made sure to douse myself in potions.
What am I trusted to you?
I was trapped in the tavern. We were trapped.
I know not to trust anyone.
I will prove this to you. I am not a witch. I will sink in the water.
Hello, my dear husband. Have you committed crimes?
But I cannot speak of a tear. I trust-
In a good way, yes. Wait, I believe I'm receiving a phone call. Hello. Oh
If it's gonna fin hang up
Oh, don't mind that. Okay, um, yes, I have a meeting I must attend.
Oh, a meeting? With who? All of a sudden?
I must listen to all sides of what is happening?
She was about to say I am hexed by a witch. I am not.
Jonathan, you would be one of the first to know.
Yes, you seem, you seem as, uh, the same as ever.
You don't see any change to me?
And also, I have done the necessaries, the necessarities of not being hexed by a witch.
And do you remember that, Jonathan?

Yes, exactly. You know when you do your left foot in, your left foot out, and then you go in, and then you go out, and then you shake it all about, and then you turn around, and that is what it's all about.
Oh, I see. So you were hexed, but you cleansed yourself?
Ah, what was the hex effect?
For my face went red when she said certain words at me,
I see. So what is the issue? Why have you been arguing with the princess?
Oh, I was checking if she de-flopped, um, I mean, your partner will tell you. I don't know if you knew, but someone, uh, your sneak is minus 20.
Nerissa Ravencroft, please meet me in front of the tavern.
Oh, she's talking. She's on the phone.
Don't you love it when the phone automatically answers?
It goes straight into my brain.
I have no time to properly answer or not answer even.
Anyway, someone defamed the worm queen.
Oh, and it wasn't you, was it?
I have done no such thing as a hex.
I have put no such hex on you.
Oh, gosh. I need to eat.
What happens if I do this?
No, but I'll do so right now.
We have decided the punishment for, or rather, the solution for the problem is we are to be married right now.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.

No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no
I came at a very confusing, no-context timing, so all I saw was the kiss and now all I see is your sword.
Well, do you not love her?
That is a very strong word.
Why would you even say such a thing?
Banish the thought from your mind.
I'm not thinking of you anymore.

No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No! No
Give me one good reason, hm?
Get off that high horse, milady!
Yes, get off your high horse!
Why do you want me as a wife?
Uh, because then I have another wife.
Ugh, obviously. Maybe leave some wives for the wifeless ones, huh?
Maidenless. You already also have a wife!
No, I- I- actually, since I am a knight, I am not to be wed- and I am not to be enjoying the company of any woman at night in my bed.
There we go! Don't say that in front of Knight Lady Bloodflame.
Well, we have already- She probably follows the same morals!
You have to take responsibility as a knight!
yes i am pregnant you are not i'm pregnant and it's yours what are you five
There are some medieval techniques to find out if a woman is pregnant or not.
You shall pee on top of this red stone.
And if the red stone turns green, then that means you are preganante.
No, that's not how it works.
Here, let me trade to you my red stone.
You just don't want to because you're not pregnant.
You're welcome. We knights, we must stay on our own to protect whoever we're protecting.
Everyone. We protect all. Especially the king.
Exactly! The king whom they have been saying is a traitor and is leading us all to our demise, but I cannot believe it yet!
He is not. He is not that way. He is a great king.
I believe in the king and the queen, Tim Tams.
Okay, that's where I draw the line.
Stop trying to make a child.
It's a baby! And it's yours!
It looks more like mine, Nerissa.
It looks more like the phoenix.
Look at that redness on it.
Look, we both have red and white on us somewhere.
Will you truly abandon your son and wife?
I feel like he's gonna abandon me.
The sun is gone, it is but the moon now.
Dr. Oshikiara just murdered my child!
If you watched my lore video, it says I am the owner of a fashion restaurant-
I am just creating fried chickens!
I have been praying for a chicken to die.
You listen to the mighty phoenix.
I hope you learned from recovering your memory how mighty you are.
Oh! Honestly, it started off pretty mighty, but then it seems like I have been degraded to just a fast food restaurant owner.
How dare you! You brought a plot of land back from its ashes!
Oh, thank you! That is very mighty! Not anyone could do that.
I am doubting myself very highly now. Then stop it!
I don't know who I am anymore! Do not doubt yourself anymore and stop groveling to that queen!
Well, I would have thought that after seeing your memory that you would have knocked some sense into you.
Well, I will say that even if we are rooting for different queens, we are still...
...united in our love for the king.
That shall be our bond, no matter what.

No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no
The mighty phoenix has different wording.
Yes, I came up with it.
We shall learn from this mighty phoenix.
You can call it a video.
Before you could call it a vidya.
Did we not forget that she murdered my child?
No! It was never your child!
You were just pretending to get
box that she is not willing
I'm not gonna lie, my lady,
Oh my goodness! You seem to have given her the itch!
How often do you lay these eggs?
I only lay eggs here. I don't actually lay eggs.
Wait, how could it be her child?
Would it not be your own child?
Where was the human in this bird that we saw?
It should have been grotesque and disgusting of a child.
When did you guys consummate your marriage?
I did not know that, you guys!
Yesterday, I was caught in the tree, and Urb came and trapped me.
And while we were trapped in the tree, we consummated our love for each other.
No, we did not. I trapped her in the tree.
I mean, the troll came round and trapped her in the tree.
The usual incubation time for a bird is about 21 days, so if it happened yesterday, you could have not possibly already laid the egg TODAY!
No! It must have been someone from 21 days ago!
I'm beginning to think you are a witch.
I was going by the witch.
You were saying she's a witch?
I have a crystal in my arm.
What else would you be doing, mother witch?
We need to question her, and with your compassion.
That's not how you do it in my land!
You're supposed to put on a shake and burn her!
I'll rub this medicine old beetroot on it, there you go.
Ah, what a good daughter you are.
Also, she's fine. She's not dead! She's dead!
She's dead! No! You killed her!
Also, uh, um, ladies, uh, haha, did you, uh...
Did you, uh, uh, uh, see the, uh, the, the, the notice board with, uh...
There's a tournament. A grand tournament will be held in an hour and ten minutes at the arena.
The prize is honor. Join us and sharpen your blades and prepare to test your mind.
It is training as well, for the fight ahead!
Everybody gets a wooden sword, it is a fair fight.
I was worried I might kill my opponents, but I'm a wood sword, maybe not!
Haha, I hope you do, Jonathan. Haha, I mean, well, not kill, but bludgeon them and win! Haha!
But anyway, yes, that'll be held in an hour and ten minutes from now.
An hour and ten minutes! Oh, okay.
So it's on the hour and hopefully there'll be more participants by then, maybe.
I shall wait for the princess to go.
Where did she go? She disappeared so quickly.
My fellow Jade member, I believe it might be good if we build a courthouse, I believe you are working on a bunker, no?
Ah yes, I mean yes, you can add a courtroom if you wish, yes.
Yes, but to trial, decide if they must use the gallows, they must use the gallows on them.
Well this is bias against the Ambercorn members that you have!
She's wearing a hat for no reason?
Just for fun? It's just a very swish hat.
Embercoin, I have only served my honorable king and queen.
The eye of Embercoin stares into my wallet.
I do not care for your coins!
Why are you trying to hurt her?
Why are you trying to hurt my girl?
Sorry, I can't control my feeling fire.
It happens to the best of us.
I shall remove myself from any people because it seems like my fire hurts people.
I don't know what they are on about.
From your misuse of your revelation.
You should be able to control it better now.
It is fun to jump, it is good exercise!
But if you can cure me of that, can you cure, uh, Tim Tender of her, uh, negative ass?
Oh, I mean, she does anyway.
She looks like she is doing a a certain run style from the side.
It looks like she's doing a certain run.
I want to say we are fight fighting dreamers.
She looks down on us like she always does. How appropriate.
She looks like a worm. Haha, right Jonathan?
hello are you okay you ran off very fast oh yes i wanted to get some work on my moai
done before the tournament ah yes oh you are going to join in i am proud of you
yes maybe you are my daughter
Have we seen the Queen's back? Is it quite voluptuous?
It is covered by a cape! You will not look!
You don't need to look, there's nothing there.
Well, that is quite accurate, no?
My best help wasn't built anyway.
Wait a minute, I forgot to check this chest. What is this chest here?
I don't think I have a way of breaking in. Let's have some carrots.
I have to say, it is a lot more quieter when the witch is not around.
She's performed another hex on me with that kiss.
This is probably Fuwawa and Mokoko's.
I heard that will come. What are you doing up there?
Oh, they can fly, I forgot.
I think your wife has trust.
Oh, she is very little. I don't know how to say this.
She is busy, she is busy. She is locked in, as they say.
I have the beauty of the sun.
How much you look like a little fly as you fly up in the air.
She is the poop and you are the fly.
I do not know what you mean there.
It's just how loyal you are.
I've worked very hard in her honor.
She has made me her knight.
Is that really the only reason?
Jonathan can make you her knight.
I am her knight. Oh, well, oh, you're two-timing. Oh, that's nice. Where's my statue? Yeah, where's, where's Jonathan's statue?
It'll be right here. If you, if you wish it, I will make you a statue, my sweet.
Might I request a smaller one, perhaps? You do not want a statue this large?
I don't think I can stand next to the queen. I am not a queen, a king. You can stand side by side though.
Do you want to hold hands with the queen?
No, no, no, no, no. That would be too, too, too lewd.
Oh, oh, oh. Right now? You and I?
I think she was asking for you to hold her hand.
Hand holding? I will have none of that in this kingdom that is lewd.
I am holding her hand right now.
Oh, oh, oh. It is lewd.
I have let go. I have let go.
Grabs and drags away. Come this way. Come this way.
Pulling you away. Over here. Over here.
Let them be for a moment.
Is she not the queen if she is the mother of the princess?
Or is she but a consort?
Handholding is okay on wholesome occasions.
Who taught you how to kiss?
Uh-uh. What am I stepping on?
Corruption seems to be spreading. I am quite concerned of this as the princess of the kingdom.
Darkness is approaching. Wait a minute.
Who introduced this darkness to our kingdom?
The darkness, it's taking over our lands.
Well, it's obviously someone of the Cerulean Cup who has cursed this part of the land.
Do you know who it was?
Dear husband, you're not lying to me, are you?
She has taken the hat off her head
She's free. We have freed her. We have freed her of- of its influence.
Influence, you say? Would you say that you...
Do you have any memory of the past two days?
Do you have any memories of...
Do you remember what we've done?
What? I-I-This is the first time I'm seeing you today.
Do you remember who I am?
Uh, remember? I told you yesterday, I'm not your mother.
That is a bit strange that she forgot.
Hmmm. I'll think on it more later.
I need to get some stains and make money.
make some money before the tournament
That's a lot easier than it was my first day here.
What a sword that you have!
My... My turn to kill you, m'lady!
I just wanted to inform you that
in an hour, there is a tournament.
A grand tournament to be held
at the arena. The prize is honor
and it should be a jolly time.
and prepare to test your might in an hour
Oh my! Perhaps could I sharpen my eyes and watch everything unfold?
